creditline: Gift of Marc Felix in honor of Ray and Ruth Reister
description: standing male figure with crested hat/headgear with flat brim; midriff covered with bulbous composite earth-based mass with ovoid cavity at front center; metal ring around neck; wedge-shaped beard; vertical scarifications on face; long, triangular-shaped nose; rectangular-shaped mouth; large stylized ears; hat and eyes decorated with brass tacks; attached to black base
title: Power figure
